ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] Atlas
ygData.msgSnippet: Oh yea! I just went out and looked again and your right. Ok! :) Another thing I would like to see SOE or Verant do is make a book with all the quests/skills in
ygData.messageBody:
Oh yea! I just went out and looked again and your right. Ok! :) Another
thing I would like to see SOE or Verant do is make a book with all the
quests/skills in them including pics and stuff of the items and people
involved. This would be so much nicer than trying to have to remember
what items you need because as forgetful as I am I write them down and
then I misplace the paper! lol

-----Original Message-----

From: dpbh2h <dpbh2h@...>
Subject: Re: Digest Number 574

We know this because you can see previews of the maps
on EQ main site. I agree - Verant would be better
served to support Muse and EQAtlas.
